terra 1.4-16

Virtual Raster Tiles

vrt.Rd

Create a Virtual Raster Tiles (VRT) dataset from file-based raster datasets.

# S4 method for character
vrt(x, filename="", overwrite=FALSE)

Arguments

x

character. Filenames of raster "tiles". See tiles
filename

character. Output VRT filename
overwrite

logical. Should filename be overwritten if it exists?

Value

SpatRaster

Examples

r <- rast(ncols=100, nrows=100)
values(r) <- 1:ncell(r)
x <- rast(ncols=2, nrows=2)
filename <- paste0(tempfile(), "_.tif")
ff <- makeTiles(r, x, filename)
ff
#> [1] "/var/folders/24/8k48jl6d249_n_qfxwsl6xvm0000gn/T//RtmpoHbEdK/file43c1131f7b21_1.tif"
#> [2] "/var/folders/24/8k48jl6d249_n_qfxwsl6xvm0000gn/T//RtmpoHbEdK/file43c1131f7b21_2.tif"
#> [3] "/var/folders/24/8k48jl6d249_n_qfxwsl6xvm0000gn/T//RtmpoHbEdK/file43c1131f7b21_3.tif"
#> [4] "/var/folders/24/8k48jl6d249_n_qfxwsl6xvm0000gn/T//RtmpoHbEdK/file43c1131f7b21_4.tif"

vrtfile <- paste0(tempfile(), ".vrt")
v <- vrt(ff, vrtfile)
head(readLines(vrtfile))
#> [1] "<VRTDataset rasterXSize=\"100\" rasterYSize=\"100\">"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
#> [2] "  <SRS dataAxisToSRSAxisMapping=\"2,1\">GEOGCS[\"WGS 84\",DATUM[\"WGS_1984\",SPHEROID[\"WGS 84\",6378137,298.257223563,AUTHORITY[\"EPSG\",\"7030\"]],AUTHORITY[\"EPSG\",\"6326\"]],PRIMEM[\"Greenwich\",0],UNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433,AUTHORITY[\"EPSG\",\"9122\"]],AXIS[\"Latitude\",NORTH],AXIS[\"Longitude\",EAST],AUTHORITY[\"EPSG\",\"4326\"]]</SRS>"
#> [3] "  <GeoTransform> -1.8000000000000000e+02,  3.6000000000000001e+00,  0.0000000000000000e+00,  9.0000000000000000e+01,  0.0000000000000000e+00, -1.8000000000000000e+00</GeoTransform>"                                                                                                                                                                             
#> [4] "  <VRTRasterBand dataType=\"Float32\" band=\"1\">"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
#> [5] "    <NoDataValue>nan</NoDataValue>"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
#> [6] "    <ColorInterp>Gray</ColorInterp>"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
v
